channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Pomelli
item.description:
Build your business DNAEnter your website, and Pomelli will analyze it and create a "Business DNA" profile for your brand. Generate tailored campaign ideasOnce your Business DNA is established, Pomelli generates tailored campaign ideas specifically for your business. Edit and create high-quality, branded creativesFinally, Pomelli creates a set of high-quality, on-brand marketing assets designed to help grow your brand across various channels, like your social media, your site and your ads.

Read more

item.title: Crossfire: High-performance lockless spsc/mpsc/mpmc channels for Rust
item.description:
Crossfire High-performance lockless spsc/mpsc/mpmc channels. It supports async contexts, and communication between async and blocking contexts. 1 cron_master_tokio_x86 STABLE async-std cron_master_async_std_x86 STABLE smol cron_master_smol-x86 STABLE arm threaded cron_master_threaded_arm STABLE tokio >= 1.

Read more

item.title: A Few Words About Async
item.description:
This kind of performance is called throughput. If you’re writing a web server, you have more leeway. Well, that’s what this entire post is all about.
